text: Sailing was contested at the 2019 Summer Universiade from 8 to 12 July 2019 at the Circolo Italia in Naples. Singapore won its second ever medal at the Universiade in this event. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== == Events == {| |- |Match race | Alexander Grönblom Oskari Muhonen Catharina Sandman Cecilia Sandman | Johanna Daum Stefan Scharnagl Luis Wenger-Oehn Hannah Ziegler | Scott Lan Jillian Lee Tan Jen-e Cheryl Teo |} ==References== ==External links== *2019 Summer Universiade – Sailing *Results book – Sailing (Archived version) Universiade Category:2019 Summer Universiade events Category:Sailing at the Summer Universiade
title: Sailing at the 2019 Summer Universiade
